title: Strengthening Systems Design Competencies: VR-Based Short-Intensive Science Job Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific principles and experience in administrative/management tasks
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform science experiment procedures with 90% accuracy in a VR simulation environment
Learners can establish and apply science problem-solving strategies three or more times using virtual reality-based data
Learners can apply scientific approaches in real-world tasks two or more times based on VR learning experiences
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
